thought: The Slack action_2 is failing because its params are not set, causing a workflow execution error. The Slack post message action requires specific params including 'select', 'channelId', 'messageType', and 'text' with proper expression for text extraction. I will set these params correctly to send the message to the 'general' channel.
plan: Set params for action_2 with 'select' as 'channel', 'channelId' mode as 'name' and value as 'general'.
Set 'text' param to '={{$json["text"]}}' to extract message text from input_data.
Test action_2 to ensure Slack message is sent successfully.
criticism: Currently, action_2 has empty params causing the workflow to fail. Proper params are critical for Slack message sending.

tool_input.comments: Send the query result to Slack channel 'general' with correct params.
TODO: Handle errors if Slack API fails
